answers.answer: Go the the ADA site..American Diabetics Assosiation..Free recipes, blogs etc..Let me no..Mostly he needs to stay away from sugar, carbs etc..I no since I have type 1 diabetes on a insulin pump. Mostly protein, vegtables and sugarfree icecream etc...Whole wheat breads with tunafish, milk, apples, etc..Let me no..Bettyann

question: Can anyone suggest a great recipe book or web page that I can refer to for my 9 year old son's snacks and school lunches primarily.  This is all soo new to me, but I don't want to bore him by sending the same things in his lunch box day after day.My Diabetes Educator/Nutritionist has not been any help and I feel soo lost...
title: Recipe Ideas for newly diagnosed 9 yr old son
